entry.title: What is Art?
entry.content: Art can be defined by many things. Painting, drawing, sculpting. But art is more than that too. Writing, dancing, cooking. If you can create it, it is art.
entry.summary: Art can be defined by many things. Painting, drawing, sculpting. But art is more than that too. Writing, dancing, cooking. If you can create it, it is art.
